remarks: The unital ring homomorphisms between unital rings (in a universe) are a subcategory subset of the non-unital ring homomorphisms between non-unital rings (in the same universe).  (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rhmsscrnghm.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rhmsscrnghm.r $e |- ( ph -> R = ( Ring i^i U ) ) $.
rhmsscrnghm.s $e |- ( ph -> S = ( Rng i^i U ) ) $.
rhmsscrnghm $p |- ( ph -> ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) C_cat ( RngHomo |` ( S X. S ) ) ) $.
